update t_cons_order_details
orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sumAmount = #{sumamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_cons_order_details set orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sumAmount = #{sumamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.groupNo as groupId, a.goodsId, b.goodsName, b.goodsThumbnail as goodsImage, a.quantity as goodsQuantity, a.unitPrice as goodsPrice, a.specifications as goodsPropertiesDB from t_cons_order_details a inner join t_goods b on a.goodsId = b.goodsId where a.orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
